ComicInfo.Title: Handsome; Top 11 TV Pilots That Didn't Make the New Fall Schedule; Boffy the Vampy Slayer; Why It's a Bad Idea to Hire Zombie Workers; When Gay-Themed TV Shows Get Completely Out of Hand; You Think You Got It Bad?; Another Gypsy's Tale; Field & Streaming Blood; The Upside and Downside of Future Inventions; Men in Black Manual; Somber Toddler's Book Club; After-School Activities (for Unmotivated Slugs); Everything You Wanted to Know About Cocaine But Were Too Stupid to Ask; Caveman Technology Advances!; Nature Calls; Con Job
